name: Weird Web Action RPG Battle Prototype v2.1
name_original: Weird Web Action RPG Battle Prototype v2.1
description:
CONTROLS:

Move or scroll menus - up and down arrow keys

Shoot (when act bar is full) or choose menu options  - X key

Toggle pause UI (when act bar is full) or back out of menus - Z Key

OTHER USEFUL TIPS/INSTRUCTIONS:

You can access the item and spell menus from the pause UI. Shoot mana bubbles (the bubble-like things with star-like crystal things inside them that float up from the bottom of the screen sometimes - you'll know them when you see them) to gain MP to casts spells (currently just a single defense spell in this prototype). You also have a few of a single healing item if needed.

The game automatically resets when either side wins. You'll have to click in the game window after starting it or toggling full screen for the controls to respond. If you do decide to play in full screen (which would make sense), I'd advise you pause before doing so.

This is a prototype for the game's battle system, so any feedback is greatly appreciated. I hope you'll try the full game when it's finished!

Have fun, and good luck not exploding!
